content.prompt: The Declaration of Independence did all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: appeal to the philosophy of natural rights
call for the abolition of the slave trade
appeal to the sympathies if the English people
criticize the provisions of the Quebec Act of 1774

topic.text: 3.4: Philosophical Foundations of the American Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
